definition.text: Each product may have one Plotter Module associated with it. This Plotter Module has all the definitions needed to interpret the Product's datasets and render the information on a chart.

paragraphs.text: Superalgos has the capability to allow it's users to create plotters without writing any code. The plotter is defined at the Designer Space. This is done by means of defining vertices and polygons. Users can create custom charts for any Dataset.
